snippet.title: Super Mario Bob-omb Blast - Demo Trailer (2024)
snippet.description:
Super Mario Bob-omb Blast is a full scale 9 worlds New Super Mario Bros. Wii mod that aims to bring an experience with a level of quality akin to official Super Mario Games.
It places itself as a sequel and a partial remake of the original games, with a brand new theme attached to it; Bombs!

Alongside this trailer, i have also released a brand new demo for the mod. It features a handful of levels from the final game, have fun!
Download Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fzUorgejJO_kH1u-vGBpu-4tKrZ0cItj/view?usp=sharing

If you are experienced in programming for New Super Mario Bros WII, or are a modeler/animator and you're interested in speeding up development
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/XWAxgK86hB

I would like to thank everyone who watched this trailer to the end. it has been a pleasure to work on this mod since its inception in February of 2020. The project grew in scope and ambition, but also in quality.
This trailer specifically has been in my mind for years now, and was supposed to accompany a full game release, a month ago for NSMBW's 15th anniversary.
Sadly this ended up not being possible for multiple reasons, i do hope that this demo can satisfy you all for the time being.
I also hope to release it next year, in 2025, although nothing is set in place yet.
I hope you have a fun time with the demo, see you next year!
